function.name: content_downloader
function.description:
**Content Downloader**  
The system have the content blob storage. URLs of the storage have relative format `files/<bucket_id>/<file_path>/<file_name>`. In case if tool requires the bytes or byte content of the url, this tool should be used to resolve file storage URL to the actual byte content

url.description: URL to resolve content. Should be in format `files/<bucket_id>/<file_path>/<file_name>`. DONT make up URL, only exact URLs would work.
